app_detail:
Bring! helps millions of people around the world plan and manage their grocery shopping. Thanks to the user-friendly shopping list and clever sharing functions, all people in the household know what's missing in the fridge and pantries. This way, you save plenty of time and money while shopping. Try it out now - it's free! 

â˜…Two-time winner of Google Play's Â«Editors' ChoiceÂ» Awardâ˜…Recommended by Android PIT, Android Central, TechCrunch, Android Police and many moreâ˜…


LATEST UPDATES:
ğŸ’³ Save all your loyalty cards in your Bring! wallet now ğŸ’³


THE FEATURES:
â˜…Create and share shopping lists with your family, colleagues and friends.
â˜…TOP: Send clever, ready-made messages to inform your contacts that you are going shopping or have changed the list.
â˜…Create shopping list templates for any occasion â€“ at home, in your office, holiday cabinet or for travels with friends.
â˜…Add your own photos to the items on your shopping list to always let your friends know what brand to buy.
â˜…The Bring! catalogue includes many hundred articles. If something is missing, you just add articles yourself. 


GOOD TO KNOW:
â˜…Bring! is optimised for smartphones, tablets and smartwatches, and is compatible with the voice agents Alexa and Google Assistant.
â˜…Collect & send super cool ğŸ©WhatsApp StickersğŸ¥¦ #WAStickerApps.
â˜…The Bring! App can be downloaded for free. 


YOUR FEEDBACK:
We are keen to know what you think & need when you do your daily groceries. Your inputs will help us steer Bring! in the right direction and create the best shopping experience for you. Contact: feedback@getbring.com

We can't wait to hear from you,

Your Bring! Team
